commit 09d191463d027497ff2c3ef888c0b6a3b4ff94b2
Author: Sebastian Magnusson <sebbe.magnusson@gmail.com>
Date:   Sat Jan 9 20:49:12 2021 +0100

    Enable JSON subscription imports (#878)
    
    * Rename parser variable
    
    * Add support for parsing json files
    
    The files are now parsed as json if xml is not explicitly specified
    in the file suffix. The old xml parser is kept more or less intact.
    
    * Remove XML from GUI strings
    
    Mentions of "xml" have been removed from all strings related to
    subscription imports. I hope that i didn't butcher any translations.
    
    * Fix error in if clause
    
    * Close file reader after reading
    
    * Improve readability of null checking
    
    * Turn JSON primitives into Strings properly
    
    * Revert "Remove XML from GUI strings"
    
    This reverts commit a9165a8052281194f2703656d59a6348ae3acffa.
    Following advice from maintainer, the changes to language files
    should be reverted and left to translators.
    
    * Remove mentions of XML from base language file
    
    This change was previously reverted along with changes to the
    translation files. This change is still desirable, however.
    
    * Add json to comments mentioning xml files
    
    * Fix Swedish translation
    
    As a Swedish native speaker, I felt that I was at least qualified
    to edit this translation. If it should be done by somebody else
    and/or in another way, this commit may be omitted from the merge.
    
    * Revert "Remove mentions of XML from base language file"
    
    This reverts commit 73287adcc5ab79399e9b751fe2e5d965eb73cad8.
    This change was not desirable, after all.
    
    * Change string name and remove XML from GUI strings
    
    Changed string name to be more general and not include file type.
    The reference is also changed in the Swedish language file, as the
    translations there have also been changed in this PR. References in
    other translation files need to be changed by their respective
    translators. The word XML has been removed from GUI strings where
    applicable.
    
    * Fix forgotten reference in code

commit 2b4cba295cbc4804448eb8178b24584fa4f27a79
Author: Zsombor Gegesy <gzsombor@gmail.com>
Date:   Fri Jan 17 00:54:26 2020 +0100

    Fix #626 - db upgrade scenario.
     The source of the problem is that in the old db version,
     there wasn't any information about the channel, apart from the ID -
    and this was copied to the local cache table. If these kind of channels are filtered,
    then it triggers a network re-fetch.

commit 399096227643c51ca08ed9f0e166c0d7b756a908
Author: Chris Bellew <chrisb@roidna.com>
Date:   Mon Aug 26 13:09:30 2019 -0700

    When the app is resumed and the previous connection to a Chromecast fails (e.g. due to not being on wifi anymore), before the connection fails, attempting to play a video will wait until the connection to the Chromecast has been re-established. When this fails, the app should hide the spinner and play the video the device.
    
    To elaborate, here are the steps to reproduce this bug which this branch fixes:
    1) Start up the app, connect to wifi and connect to a Chromecast.
    2) Kill the app (so it's not running anymore).
    3) Disconnect from Wifi.
    4) Fire the app up, and within the first few seconds of it opening, attempt to play a video.
    
    The spinner will show, and just sit there spinning. This is caused by the fact that the app was previously connected to a Chromecast, so it attempts to reconnect. However, when this fails, the app keeps waiting for connection to be established, assuming it will eventually.
    
    The new behavior will be that the spinner will show, but once the connection to the Chromecast fails, the spinner will be hidden, and the video will play on the device.

10	0	app/src/extra/java/free/rm/skytube/gui/activities/BaseActivity.java
1	1	app/src/extra/java/free/rm/skytube/gui/businessobjects/YouTubePlayer.java

Date:   Sun Apr 15 15:55:44 2018 +0200

    ImportSubscriptionsAdapter in now renamed as MultiSelectListPreferenceAdapter.  This adapter is used by MultiSelectListPreferenceDialog - a common class that lists items, allows to user to select multiple items and can select/deselect all items.  Class used by SubscriptionsManager and preferred languages preference.  As a result, the Preferred Language(s) preference now allows the users to easily choose the language(s) they fancy.

    Fixed a search-related bug which could be reproduced as follows:
    1. Search a previously search term (the suggestions popup will appear)
    2. Add a character to the search term such that it is a string never searched before.
    3. The white popup will disappear however a dark one will still be displayed.

commit fd912367066bce6760e4a3bbb7d93282d720e5f3
Author: Ramon M <ramon.mifsud@yandex.com>
Date:   Tue Jan 2 15:53:15 2018 +0100

    Restructured the free.rm.skytube.businessobjects:
    * Classes that communicates with YT servers were moved to free.rm.skytube.businessobjects.YouTube
    * Tasks used to retrieve data from YT were moved to free.rm.skytube.businessobjects.YouTube.Tasks
    * YouTube related POJOs were moved to free.rm.skytube.businessobjects.YouTube.POJOs

commit 9e284a339cf30d0a10a2e6820e716822a19e9b3f
Author: Chris Bellew <atomjack@gmail.com>
Date:   Mon Dec 18 13:17:31 2017 -0800

    MainFragment should save the state of its Child Fragments, when the Activity needs to be destroyed, and restore them when it's recreated. Not doing this was causing the child fragments to be recreated, and for the currently selected one to be set not selected, which was preventing the Refresh Dialog from showing when the selected fragment was the Subscriptions Feed Fragment.

commit e1c1f286c4dd8062a2735361418ac6d85f3eae43
Author: Chris Bellew <atomjack@gmail.com>
Date:   Thu Dec 28 10:05:47 2017 -0800

    Fixed bug that was crashing the app when attempting to view a video not available in the user's country. When the Download BroadcastReceiver receives notification that a download is complete, make sure the referenceId for that download matches the one for *that* video, and only then save the video to the database. This is needed when downloading multiple videos. Also, unregister the BroadcastReceiver when a StreamError is encountered.

commit 214e993cd9c096cffb6ccae40d1e874dd11c68f9
Author: Ramon M <ramon.mifsud@yandex.com>
Date:   Tue Dec 26 21:06:03 2017 +0100

    GetSubscriptionVideosTask used to retrieve YouTube subbed channels from DB and YT servers.  This task was also being performed by SubsAdapter and hence internet data was being wasted and app ran slower.
    
    This task is now only performed by SubsAdapter -- GetSubscriptionVideosTask will wait until SubsAdapter retrieves the necessary YT Channels info.
    
    As a result, the Subscription Feed Fragment loading time is now improved by around 20%.

81	53	app/src/main/java/free/rm/skytube/businessobjects/GetSubscriptionVideosTask.java

commit 6b8f2e48d4e038e2d97e1c9f8ae1a745475af006
Author: Ramon M <ramon.mifsud@yandex.com>
Date:   Wed Dec 6 22:17:09 2017 +0100

    * Implemented the immersive mode for the YouTube player (i.e. comments and info icons together with the nav bar are hidden after X seconds).  Immersive mode is enabled by default although it can be disabled.
    * Immersive Mode:  comments can be viewed if the user swipes to the left hand side.
    * Immersive Mode:  video description can be viewed if the user swipes to the top.
    * Media controller is not redisplayed if the user taps in the middle of the screen when one of the drawers (e.g. comments) is opened; instead the drawer is closed.
